name: Behavioral Health Services
description: Behavioral Health Services is an essential component of our holistic approach to youth development. Clubhouses have a Behavioral Health Services Specialist who serves as a liaison, meeting with staff teams to discuss successes and challenges that Club members are experiencing. This close collaboration allows us to create a comprehensive support system to support youth in the most effective way possible. Behavioral Health Specialists support commitment to cultivating caring and supportive communi

howToGetIt: To learn more about the B&GC Behavioral Health Services program and opportunities, visit kidsclub.org/BHS
